name: vega-ar
description: Publish Vega visualizations as embedded web components.

scripts.copy:dist: rsync -rv --exclude=tsconfig.tsbuildinfo build/* dist/ && rsync -rv test/spec/vega-ar/* dist/spec/ && cp -r images dist/ && cp package.json dist/
scripts.pushghpage: cd dist && git add --all && git commit -m "Release at $(date)" && git push
scripts.release: npm run clean:dist && npm run pullghpage && rm -rf dist/* && npm run copy:dist && npm run pushghpage
